explains: n. 显著（等于 saliency）；突出；卓越

sentences.en: The answer is the salience attribute.
Another important aspect of a rule is the optional salience attribute.
sentences.cn: 规则的另一个重要的方面是可选的salience属性。

sentences.en: So, the value of the salience attribute for this rule is the lowest one: 10.
sentences.cn: 所以，该规则的salience属性值最低：10。
